events.description: Anthony Volpe doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Myles Straw.

Jose Ramirez doubles (6) on a fly ball to left fielder Franchy Cordero. Steven Kwan to 3rd.
Guardians challenged (trap play), call on the field was overturned: Josh Naylor singles on a fly ball to center fielder Aaron Hicks. Steven Kwan scores. Jose Ramirez to 3rd.
Yankees manager Aaron Boone ejected by 2B umpire Larry Vanover.
On-field Delay.
